Patrick Wadden

Product Designer Interaction Designer London, UK

About Me

I'm a Product Designer and Interaction designer with a passion for crafting solutions that are both incredibly straightforward and intuitive to use.

I've worked for the big, and I've worked for the small. But what I love doing the most is diving in and learning new things.

I code, I design, I lead, and I plan. I'm comfortable with large enterprise projects, or small nauenced interaction design.

Project Highlights

I can't go into details about some of my more recent work here unfortunately, but I can share some of the more interesting projects I've worked on in the past.

Twilight Golf

Visit site

My latest obsession is golf. And when me and some friends kicked off a summer league last year, there was no easy way to keep track of who's played and who's winning. So I've spun up a quick app to create a mini league with your mates. It's now never been easier to claim those bragging rights, and show who's the best. Not me, unfortunately.

Anaml

Visit holding page

An enterprise tool to solve an enterprise problem. Anaml solves the difficult problem of data transformation, by abstracting complex logic and data science behind a simple, user firendly UI. Designing and building a large, complex enterprise app was the day job, but it also required me to immerse myself in the world of big data.

Westpac Mobile Banking

The oldest bank in Australia wanted a modern app. Not only did they want to add game changing functionality, but they wanted it to look the part too. The biggest customer touch point for the bank has been competely overhauled, and I was at the heart of it.

Myer Photo Wall

Working with a Live Engagement Specialist, we placed a 12 screen video wall into one of Myer's prime window locations in the heart of the Sydney. Displaying Instagram photos and videos of the Myer Giftorium hashtag was the easy part, having it moderated and run non-stop for 50 days leading up to Christmas was the fun part.

PayPal Global Website

Visit archived site

I led a team of three in the global redesign of PayPal's Account Features page. A Crucial customer touch point, this page showcases what you can do with a PayPal account. Launching across PayPal.com in 193 countries and suitable for any device, using universal design and interaction principals that put the user at the center of the experience was a must.
